name: STAIRWAY TO DESTINY (STAIRWAY TO DEATH)
description:
PLAY THE GAME HERE OR ON THE GITHUB!

This is a demo version of a project I have been working on for a while.

STAIRWAY TO DESTINY, also previously known as 'STAIRWAY TO DEATH', or also just 'STAIRWAY' or SW2D, is a platformer game that works on most modern devices. This game is not complete, but I have made a demo version that you can try out for now. This game... is not what it seems. In future installments, you will be able to:

- Unlock Multiple Endings

- Uncover hidden lore

- Maybe a couple minigames too???

For now, you can:

- Play the classic version of STAIRWAY

- Enjoy several levels of platforming action

- Maybe uncover a little bit of lore and some easter eggs too???

E N J O Y
